name: Trick or Treat! (Nixiii, Tossu, MmayraA, MikkoM)
name_original: Trick or Treat! (Nixiii, Tossu, MmayraA, MikkoM)
description:
Submission for: Finnish College Game Jam #3

Game made in 4 days.

This is a trick or treating game, with enemies in your way to stop you from getting candy!

The one with the most candy will be ruled as Halloween King!

- Be sure to share your results! :)
